body_html: Thanks @csarofeen . I wasn't careful with the GPU synchronization. I know the parameterization of convolution is weird because I wanted to have my matrices the exact same size as I had in my Fully connected network (which was basically the gemm) that I had seen the speedup with float16.
body_text: Thanks @csarofeen . I wasn't careful with the GPU synchronization. I know the parameterization of convolution is weird because I wanted to have my matrices the exact same size as I had in my Fully connected network (which was basically the gemm) that I had seen the speedup with float16.
body: Thanks @csarofeen . I wasn't careful with the GPU synchronization. I know the parameterization of convolution is weird because I wanted to have my matrices the exact same size as I had in my Fully connected network (which was basically the gemm) that I had seen the speedup with float16.
